sub:
阿勇
A-Yong!

你去哪里啊 阿勇
A-Yong! Where are you going?

截至一月二十二日二十四时
As of midnight Jan. 22

国家卫健委 收到
the National Health Commission received

国内二十五个省区市
from 25 provinces and municipalities

累计报告新型冠状病毒
reports of new corona virus infection

感染的肺炎确诊病例五百七十一例
a total of 571 confirmed cases

其中重症九十五例
of which 95 cases are critical

我们叫了四个小时的车
We've waited four hours

都没有人敢去
No one would pick us up

一个二个的都往后躲
Everyone's avoiding us

你们这些医生
You doctors

为什么要冲到前头 替别人卖命啊
How come you are always on the front line?

反正老子不信邪
Whatever, I'm not scared

生死由命 富贵在天
Life or death, fame and fortune, it's all fate

紧急通知 武汉长江隧道将暂时关闭
Emergency alert : the Yangtze Tunnel will be temporarily closed

请在现场工作人员的指挥下 有序撤离隧道
Please follow directions and evacuate calmly

我跟你说了
I told you

不要当着客人的面和酒店纠缠
don't argue in front of the guests

先换一个
Just find another hotel

换一个能够接受武汉人的酒店
that would accept guests from Wuhan

星级价位同档次
in the same price range

赶快把他们两个搞回来
Get the two of them back quickly

君君还有三个多月就要生了
Junjun is due in three months

不老老实实在屋里养胎
She should have stayed home

挺个肚子满世界耍
not traveling to the other side of the world

你个当妈的
You are her mother

还助纣为虐
now you are helping them stay away?

你莫吵了好不好
Stop yelling

我这世界各地有十五个团 都困住回不来
I have 15 tour groups who are stuck right now

你让我处理下工作好不好
Let me deal with this mess

你搞清楚一点 是五千 不是五百
Hey let's be clear, it's 5000, not 500

刘亚兰
Liu Yalan

老子跟你说正事儿
I am talking to you!

你不要吵了 好不好
Please don't yell

个板马
God damn it!

什么时候了 你还添堵
What the hell are you doing?

你不会开车回家去
Go home if you don't know how to drive!

你说什么
Are you talking to me?

你下来 来来来 你下来
Get out of the car, come on, get out!

你就像个苕
You idiot

妈
Mom

哎 我在超市
Yes, I'm at the market

菜不多了
There's hardly anything fresh left

藕 藕
Lotus root, lotus root

等一下
Hold on a minute

没抢到藕
The lotus roots are all gone

没抢到就没抢到
It's all right

赶快回来
Just come home

外面不安全
It's not safe out there

好 好
Okay okay

受疫情影响
Due to the outbreak

离汉通道即将关闭
all transportation in and out of Wuhan will be shut down

现场迎来了大批退票人员
Many passengers are demanding refunds

具体情况
More details ......

对不起
Excuse me

我姑娘从深圳回来还可以吗
Can my daughter still come back from Shenzhen?

对不起
Excuse me

非常抱歉
I am sorry

十点以后所有离汉通道将会关闭
all transportation will be shut down by 10am

她不是离汉的 她是回来
She's not leaving Wuhan, she's coming back in

建议不回汉
It's best that she doesn't

啥时候开呢
When will transportation resume?

明天 后天 大后天总得有个时间吧
Tomorrow? The day after? There's got to be a date

非常抱歉现在还在等通知
I am sorry we must wait for further notice

暂时不知道
We don't know at the moment

您需要退票吗
Do you need a refund?

我不退怎么办
What else can I do?

好 您稍等
Okay, please wait for a moment

对不起啊 对不起
I am sorry, I am sorry

对不起
I am sorry

您的票已退
Your ticket is canceled

钱会全额退还到您的账户
and you'll be refunded in full

还不全额 还扣钱
Of course in full! It's not my fault

谢谢你啊师傅
Thank you so much sir

我也不知道 给你多少合适
I don't know how much to pay you

这个时候不谈钱 不谈钱
Don't worry about money, not now

你们下班
When you finish working

我们最近不回去了
We won't be going home for a while

保护家人
need to protect our families

对对对
Yes you are right

你别下车
Please don't get out of the car

这个病毒蛮狠
The virus is really tough

千万注意
Please be careful

谢谢
Thank you

这不行 这不行
No, no, please don't

你晚上回去 好好消下毒
Make sure to disinfect before going home

快走 快走
You have to hurry

谢谢了啊
Thank you

谢谢
Thank you

注意防护啊
Take care of yourself

阿勇
A-Yong!

马上封城了 你到底跑哪儿去了
The city is shutting down, where are you going?

赶快回家
Hurry home

武汉市新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情
Given the situation of new corona virus in Wuhan

防控指挥部发布通告
the Emergency Response Center announces

自二零二零年一月二十三日十时起
as of 10 o'clock on January 23

武汉市全市城市公交 地铁 轮渡
Wuhan public transport, including buses, subways and ferries

长途客运暂停运营
all operations are suspended

无特殊原因 市民不要离开武汉
all residents are asked not to travel except for special circumstances

机场 火车站 离汉通道暂时关闭
Airports and train stations will also be closed temporarily

城都封了 哪个去送啊
The city's shut down, who are doing the deliveries?

兄弟
Hey Man

看一下
Take a look

拿着拿着
Take this, take this

来 支持一下
Help me out here

啥东西
What's this?

英雄帖
Flyers for volunteers

广招天下英豪
Heros are needed

勇哥啊
A-Yong

封城了还发传单
Why bother? The whole city is shut

九八年特大洪水
Remember the Flood of '98?

南北夹击 倾泄三镇
Wuhan was completely under water

洪水来了我们要干嘛
What did we do then?

要跑
Run away?

鬼扯
Bullshit

跑不脱
There was nowhere to run

哎 勇哥我看一下
A-Yong, let me take one

病毒就像洪水
The virus is just like the flood

医生在守江堤
Doctors are protecting the dam

我们要干什么
What can we do?

扛沙袋
We can help carry sandbags

来来来
Come on, people

拿着
Pass these around

这是什么
What's this?

来 张意博
Come on, Zhang Yibo

你看一下
Take a look

来 帮我传一下
Pass it around

江城大疫 危在旦夕
Our hometown is under siege

英雄不问出处
You too can be a hero

但肯拔刀相助
If you are willing

现招募天下豪杰
We are looking for heros

第一 单身独居的优先
First, singles preferred,

无后顾之忧
no family concerns

愿意签的 欢迎
If you sign up, welcome

不愿意签的
If you don't

也不丢人
no pressure

第二 戴口罩消毒
Second, always wear a mask and disinfect

逞能犯苕是作死
Stupidity is not heroism

第三 微信群不准聊天
Third, no chitchat in the group

违者除名 永不录用
You'll be kicked out if you break the rules

本人自愿签下承诺书
I am signing under my own free will

无论生死 义无反顾
prepared to die for the cause

奋战到底 绝不服输
never give up, never surrender

这是哪个写的 政府
Who drafted this? The government?

政府
The government

你级别有点高啊
Your aim is a little high

我
I did!

你
You?

那怎么算钱呢
How do we get paid?

志愿者
Volunteers

救灾的解放军要钱吗
Are soldiers paid for disaster relief?

你又瞒着嫂子逞能犯苕
You must be doing this behind your wife's back

我跟你说
I tell you

你再这样下去
If you keep this up

嫂子让你跪搓衣板
Your wife is going to make you suffer

人在江湖 靠什么
For a man, what's the most important thing?

义字当先
Courage

病毒我都不怕 我怕老婆
I am not afraid of the virus, or my wife

我跟你说
I tell you

你要去 自己去
You go ahead if you want to

我还要赚钱养娃
I have my kid to think about

我不去白送死
I'm not dying for the cause

莫笑
Don't laugh now

事情搞大了 哪个都跑不脱
If the virus rages on, no one can escape

来
Come on

来 拿着拿着
Come on

来哈
Come on

喂
Hello

是红星连锁店的李老板 是吧
Are you Mr. Li, the owner of Red Star Grocery chain?

我是志愿者阿勇
I am volunteer A-Yong

今天不是年三十嘛
Today is New Year's Eve

我们想给医务工作者
We want to organize a holiday dinner

组织一些年夜饭
for the health workers

你看你能不能帮忙
Would you help us?

你是志愿者
You? A volunteer?

我还劳动模范呢
Don't try to swindle me

再敢打来
Believe me

老子让你在公安局看春晚信不信
I'll report you to the police

你好
Hello

是江南医疗品商店
Is this Jiangnan Pharmacy?

我是志愿者阿勇
I am Volunteer A-Yong

请问一下 你们可不可以
Please may I ask for a favor

滚远点
Stop calling

滚远点 滚远点
Go away, go away

喂 爸爸
Hi, Dad!

喂 你妈的电话打不通
Hi! I'm trying to reach your mom

她怎么不接电话呢
How come she won't answer?

她把你拉黑了
She's blocked your calls

你跑出去那么长时间
You were gone for so long

妈妈都要被你气死了
Mom is really upset

爸爸 你搞什么去了
Dad, what are you doing?

你什么时候回家啊
When are you coming home?

我就是
I am just

做志愿者嘛
volunteering

就接送一下医护
driving doctors and nurses

做志愿者 那是做好事啊
Volunteering? That's great!

你跟妈妈说
You go tell your mom

妈 妈
Mom Mom

我爸是当英雄去了
Dad is a hero

我不说
I don't care

英雄又不缺他一个
Why does he have to be a hero?

呆头呆脑的
So stupid

他以为他的武术能打得过病毒啊
Does he think his Kungfu can beat the virus?

不说不说不说嘛 老婆
Oh please sweetheart

今天是大年三十
It's New Year's Eve

新年快乐
Happy New Year

一点都不快乐
I am not happy at all

滚一边去
Go away

兄弟
Hey man

新年快乐
Happy New Year

新年快乐
Happy New Year

儿子 你在做什么啊
Son, what are you doing?

你妈消气了吗
Has Mom calmed down?

还没 她年夜饭都没吃
No, she didn't even eat dinner

墨卫侠更新了啊
Is the new installment of Superhero Mowei out?

是的爸爸
Yes Dad

你好造业啊
You are in trouble

墨卫侠拯救世界
Superhero Mowei has his girl

还有个小姐姐陪他走天涯
when he's saving the world

你得罪了我妈
You made mom mad

那就只有你一个人了
You are all alone

所以你才要帮你妈 多做些事情
I know. You should help Mom

我不在家 你不要光玩
I am not home, you are the man of the house

我没玩 我刚帮我妈洗完衣服
Yeah, I just helped her with laundry

爸爸你看
Look Dad

狗日的
You little shit

爸爸你看 这个好玩吧
Dad look at this

还不睡 小孩不能熬夜
Go to bed, it's late

快睡
Hurry

快睡觉 莫惹你妈生气
Go to bed, listen to your mother

哦
Okay

那我睡了啊
Good night

你注意安全啊 爸爸
Take care of yourself, Dad

拜拜
Bye-bye

赵虎
Zhao Hu

勇哥
A-Yong

赵虎呢
Where is Zhao Hu?

赵虎
Zhao Hu

东西拿出来
Give it back

什么东西
What?

东西拿出来 莫装
You know what, give it back!

什么东西啊
Don't know what you are talking about

我搓火
Damn it!

救援物资也可以拿
How can you steal disaster relief supplies?

蛋白粉去哪了
What happened to the protein powder?

你给我说清楚
Hey, let's be clear

谁说是我拿的了
Who told you that I took it?

我没证据 我查不到你头上
I have solid evidence

把东西拿出来
Just give it back

我不跟你计较 听到没
and I'll let it go this time

不要逼我
Don't push me

拿出来 听到没
Listen, just give it back

你放开我
Leave me alone

听到没
You heard me

放开 你放开
Let go of me

好
Alright

你说
Tell me

你要不揩油水 你脸上的N95哪儿来的
Where did you get your N95 mask then?

我脑袋系在裤腰带上了
Damn it, I am risking my life here

拿你几箱蛋白粉怎么了
What if I took a few cases of protein powder?

赵虎
Zhao Hu

天天医院里头跑啊
You go by the hospitals every day

没看到吗
Haven't you seen

医生 护士 拿命在拼哦
how the doctors and nurses risk their lives?

蛋白粉是给他们提高免疫力的
The protein powder can boost their immune system

你身强体壮的
You're strong as an ox

你拿走心不亏吗
Don't you feel guilty stealing from them?

我亏心
I feel guilty?

我天天提货送货 跑多少地方
I make daily delivery to all these dangerous places

我得见多少人
How many people do I come into contact with?

我难道不需要免疫力
Don't I need to boost my immune system too?

你别跟我胡扯
Don't talk nonsense

东西拿出来
Give it back

要不然我对你不客气听到没
Give it back or else

你还来是吧
Or else what?

给我松手
Let go of me

算了
Alright

个板马
Damn it!

我习武之人
I know Kungfu

我让你三分
I'm not going to fight you

老子不干了
I quit

什么东西啊
Who do you think you are

老子来是给你面子
I am doing you a favor

还真把自己当根葱了
You are not my boss

赵虎
Zhao Hu

你就是走
Before you go

你也把下午那批货接完再走
you are supposed to do this delivery

还代表月亮消灭你
Guardian of Justice ？

你要是再不守规矩 乱发信息
If you send this stupid message again

我代表宇宙消灭你
I am going to make you sorry

还有谁会开货车
Who else can drive a truck?

看着我做什么
What are you looking at?

后来呢
Then what happened?

后来 他有点上头
Then he got worked up

他一个黑虎掏心就冲过来了
rushed up with the "the Black Tiger"

而我嘞
And I

只是一个二字钳阳马
fought back with "the Powerful Stallion"

我借力发力 给他来了个釜底抽薪
I laid him out using his own momentum

你猜怎么样
Guess what

怎么样
What

一米九几的个子啊
He's nearly 2 meters tall

库嚓一下
Hey-yah!

就趴到地上了
flat on the ground

爸爸你好威风啊
Dad, you are cool!

你老爸 像不像你看的那个墨卫侠啊
Doesn't Dad look like your Superhero Mowei?

像 蛮像
Yes, you do!

爸
Dad

你现在干嘛呢
What are you doing now?

我在高速路口接货
I am waiting to pick up supplies at the check point

哦
Okay

儿子啊
Son

跟老爸说一下
Tell me

今年压岁钱 收了多少
how much did you get in "red envelops" this year?

我跟你商量一下
Can I ask you

你看能不能
to do me a favor?

借老爸用一下
Can you loan me

你的钱呢
your money?

哪有大人找小孩借钱的道理
How can a grownup borrow money from a kid?

谁还没个难处啊
Well everyone runs into difficulties once in while

志愿者要做贡献嘛
The volunteers are supposed to help

我就把钱都捐了
I donated all of my money

哪晓得
Who knew

我把医生的东西给搞丢了
I lost some supplies

要补上啊
I have to make up the difference

爸爸 你好夸张啊
Dad, you are too much

你把钱都捐了 又瞒着我妈吧
You donated all of your money, behind mom's back?

难怪我妈骂你到处逞强
No wonder Mom complains about you

脑壳有包
that you've lost your mind

搞什么亏什么
that you are a failure

你妈对我还是有些偏见的
Your mom is prejudiced against me

我看我妈那是火眼金睛
I think mom is really sharp

不是 我
No I

淮阳翠柳
Huaiyang Willow restaurant

是不是杭帮菜啊
is that Hangzhou style?

不是说过吗 在志愿者群里不要聊天
I said no chitchat in volunteer group

压岁钱这么多啊
That's a lot of pocket money

这是我妈让我转给你的
Mom gave me the money to send to you

眼看这都封城十几天了
The city as been shut down for days

前两天真是把我急死了
I have been so worried

这政府的防疫物资来了
Now the government sent all these

放心了
I can finally relax

等一下 等一下
Hey, hold on a moment

你看一下
Look here

我跟你说
I tell you

这些是薄的
These are thin

那些是厚的
These are thick

这些是山东来的
These are from Shandong Province

这是厚的
These are the thick ones

对 这是厚的 要分清楚
We have to keep track

然后还有生活用品
Then these are consumer goods

这些
These

还有那些 都是生活用品
and those are consumer goods too

好的 好的
Okay okay

牙刷 牙膏 毛巾
Tooth brush, tooth paste, hand towel

这是一套
these are a set

都是齐的
Everything is accounted for

所有的货 我都分类
All divided by categories

标注好了
I've marked everything

这些都是我们需要的
These are all things we need urgently

真是来得太及时了
Thank goodness they are here

也就只能做这些了
That's all we can do

这是货物的数量 你帮我签个字
The total count, please sign here

好的好的
No problem

对面的
Hey

有人没
Anyone there

出来吵个架撒
Come out, let's talk

好闷呐
So frustrating

我门口 一直在过车
There have been ambulances passing through all the time

这得多少病人啊
How many patients are there?

我这边也能看到好多救护车
I can see a lot of ambulances here too

估计是往方舱和雷神山火神山转移病人吧
They are probably moving patients to the isolation sites

老婆
Honey

我今天
Today I

我今天看到
Today I saw
